title: Cameron's World
description: A love letter to the Internet of old. An interactive collage of GeoCities websites from the 1990s, celebrating the creativity and chaos of the early web.

title: Absurd Trolley Problems
description: A game that puts you in increasingly absurd variations of the classic trolley problem. Make impossible choices and see what others decided.

title: Pointer Pointer
description: Move your mouse anywhere on the screen and watch as a photo of someone pointing at your cursor appears. Surprisingly satisfying and endlessly entertaining.

title: Koalas to the Max
description: Start with a single circle and interact with it to reveal a hidden image through an endless cascade of smaller circles. Meditative and delightful.

title: The Useless Web
description: Click the button to be taken to a random useless but entertaining website. Perfect for procrastination and discovering weird corners of the internet.
